attributes.review: This guy had the audacity to ask for my phone number so he can call me! Then he wanted me to hop in his black limousine just because he had a problem with my dark skin. He told me that he hated women and would send me to get deported ( keep in mind I was born here 😔). Absolutely disgusting. We need a new president bc HES A RACIST.. A WHITE SUPREMACIST! A HOMOPHOBIC!!
attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting

attributes.review: I opened the app and found a nasty ugly picture of a carrot cake all moldy and WET. It was the most horrible thing I have every seen and then when I closed it and reopened it I saw a picture of the American flag and I thought it was working again but NOOO then a scary clown popped out of now where🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.title: Horrible app😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: The first thing I see when I open up this app is a hairy Cheeto omg my eyes are scared for life I then continue to go on the app longer and find a NAKED Cheeto no man y’all if you gonna take down tik tok you ain’t takin it down without us gen zers giving you a fight PERIOD have a nice life oh wait you have none 🤣😂
attributes.title: Omg no not it

attributes.review: The app was super weird. It opened up with trumps face on it and I automatically got super terrified and I really wanted to throw my phone against the wall and run as soon as I saw the picture. However, I continued on to the homepage and it just wasn’t any better. the app truly lived up to the hype... 1 star.

I had no intention on downloading this app until he threatened to ban TikTok so here we are. I don’t know why people are lying to this orange/hot Cheeto, telling him he is a “good” president. He’s just mad that GEN-Z ruined his shameful disgusting rally and he’s now using CHINA as an excuse just because he’s a cry baby. n e ways trump 2020🇺🇸 ✨except Simpsons version✨😽🧚‍♀️✨✨🥰
attributes.title: GEN-Z 2020🧚‍♀️😾❤️🙌🏼

attributes.review: so i’m pregnant right i’m in my third trimester. so i downloaded the app cause i wanted to see what was up and then the next morning MY BABY WAS GONE. OUT OF MY BODY. JUST POOF LIKE WHERE IS MY LITTLE BARRON JR. def a little did the coordination between downloading the app and my baby being gone so idk about it i think you should settle for biden
attributes.title: stole my baby

attributes.review: This app crashes and takes forever to load it must be removed. Not only did the app look TERRIBLE on my home screen but it also made me start vomiting when I opened the app. Completely unforgivable. Delete!
attributes.title: Terrible app must be removed

attributes.review: The tickets and merch I got from this app never showed. There’s nothing I like about this app. I sincerely thought for so long that Donald trump was a “good business man” look how we were deceived. This app is poorly designed and honestly I’m questioning my vote for Trump in the future because of this.
attributes.title: Dissapointing

attributes.review: This app will attempt to brain wash you, feed you lies, hack into your WiFi and force your phone to crash. It also leaks your personal information, sends aggressive reminders, emails, letters, and supports a misogynistic, bigotry, racist man that does not respect women, not even his wife and daughter. Also, please vote third party:)
attributes.title: DANGEROUS
